forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early with some clearing for the afternoon. High 16C. S winds shifting to NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers this morning with mostly cloudy conditions during the afternoon hours. High 61F. S winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 8C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to considerable cloudiness and fog after midnight. Slight chance of a rain shower. Low 46F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.
